verses.name: Genesis 47:6
verses.text: The land of Egypt is before thee; in the best of the land make thy father and brethren to dwell; in the land of Goshen let them dwell: and if thou knowest any men of activity among them, then make them rulers over my cattle.

verses.name: Genesis 47:7
verses.text: And Joseph brought in Jacob his father, and set him before Pharaoh: and Jacob blessed Pharaoh.

verses.name: Genesis 47:8
verses.text: And Pharaoh said unto Jacob, How old art thou?
